definitions.title: n.pr.f.
definitions.body: (acc. to Ol:§ 277 f., contr. from [[מִיכָאֵל]]):—younger daughter of Saul, wife of David (LXX Melxol), 1Sa 14:49, 1Sa 18:20, 1Sa 18:27, 1Sa 18:28, 1Sa 19:11, 1Sa 19:12, 1Sa 19:13, 1Sa 19:17, 1Sa 19:17, 1Sa 25:44, 2Sa 3:13, 2Sa 3:14, 2Sa 6:16 = 1Ch 15:29, 2Sa 6:20, 2Sa 6:21, 2Sa 6:23; also 2Sa 21:8 (LXX Mixol), but err. for [[מֵרַב]] (LXXL Merob).
